title: Das grüne Ungeheuer
resume: Das grüne Ungeheuer is the title of a novel published in 1959 by East German author Wolfgang Schreyer. It is also the title of a five episodes miniserie adaptation from the book, produced in 1962 by film director Rudi Kurz for Deutscher Fernsehfunk.
